channel.title: Milestones & Due Dates on JavaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Milestones & Due Dates on JavaScript

item.title: Submit Project Ideas
item.description: Milestone I: Submit Project Ideas Submit three (3) ideas for your final project Due Date: Mon, Mar 9th Deliverable: Use this form to submit your final project ideas After your project ideas are submitted, I will schedule some time to meet with you to discuss your ideas

item.title: Get Idea Approved
item.description: Milestone II: Get Final Project Idea Approved Due Date: Wed, Mar 11th After meeting with the instructor and discussing your idea, you’ll formally decide what you want to build

item.title: Create Github Repository for Final Project
item.description: Milestone III: Create Github Repository for Final Project Due Date: Wed, Mar 11th Create a github repository for your final project, clone the project down to your ‘github’ folder on your laptop Submit a link to your final project’s github repository Here’s an example of what link should look like: https://github.com/kareemgrant/kg-awesome-game Deliverable: Use this form to submit your repository url Do not include spaces in your github repository names

item.title: Create & Submit Wireframes
item.description: Milestone IV: Create and Submit Wireframes Due Date: Mon, Mar 16th Create wireframes for each page layout (assuming you have multiple pages with different layouts) of your final project Instructions The following assumes you have already created a github repository for your final project and cloned the project down to your ‘github’ folder on your laptop (see Milestone II) Add a new folder to your project files/folders for final project (created in Milestone II) called wireframes

item.title: Create Project Plan
item.description: Milestone V: Create Project Plan Due Date: Fri, Mar 20th Work with the instructor team to break up your final project into a series of steps that you’ll turn into tasks Details: Create a “Github Project” for Final Project’s Github repository (see instructions found here ) Here’s a list of the (most common final project tasks) to help you get started as you create your project plans

item.title: Host Final Project
item.description: Milestone VI: Host Final Project Due Date: Wed, Apr 1st Deploy and host your fully-functioning project on Netlify (which we will go over during the Deploying and Hosting lesson) Note: DO NOT wait until your project is complete before you successfully host / deploy your application. The process of deploying / hosting application can be tricky, so figuring it out early ensures that you will avoid scrambling to get this done at the last minute.

item.title: Complete Final Project
item.description: Milestone VII: Complete Final Project Complete your final project Due Date: Mon, Apr 6th
